description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Narrative of Privations and Sufferings of United States Officers and Soldiers while prisoners of war in the hands of the Rebel Authorities. Being the Report of a Commission of Inquiry appointed by the United States Sanitary Commission. With an appendix containing the testimony. [With a supplement and photographs of certain of the sufferers.]" Author: United States Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9604.cc.9." Page: 275 Place of Publishing: Philadelphia Date of Publishing: 1864 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003728500 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
